dualCamera
Class DualCameraEvent

java.lang.Object
  dualCamera.DualCameraEvent

public class DualCameraEvent
extends java.lang.Object

DualCameraEvent is used to provide contextual information about an event to the handler processing the event

Method Detail

getSource

public DualMoteCamera getSource()
Returns the DualMoteCamera this event is using

Returns:

getLeftPoint

public XYZ getLeftPoint(int slot)
Retrieves a point from the left Wii Remote. The point retrieved corresponds to the slot number passed in.

Parameters:
slot - is the index into the point array within the Wii Remote
Returns:

getRightPoint

public XYZ getRightPoint(int slot)
Retrieves a point from the right Wii Remote. The point retrieved corresponds to the slot number passed in.

Parameters:
slotis - the index into the point array within the Wii Remote
Returns:

getRealPoints

public XYZ[] getRealPoints()
Retrieves the real point in space where the infrared light is being detected See getRealPoints in DualMoteCamera for details

Returns:

getAveragePoint

public XYZ getAveragePoint()
Averages together the points returned from getRealPoints. Useful for interpretting multiple points from the Wii Remotes as a single point. See getRealPoints in DualMoteCamera for details of how that works.

Returns:
